pullrequest.title: Switch to default to colcon from catkin-tools

content.raw:
I picked one of the ros_gazebo_pkgs jobs and it currently fails with release-tools default branch:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_melodic-bionic-amd64&build=36)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_melodic-bionic-amd64/36/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_melodic-bionic-amd64/36/

with this branch:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_melodic-bionic-amd64&build=37)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_melodic-bionic-amd64/37/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ros_gazebo_pkgs-ci-default_melodic-bionic-amd64/37/
